thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 22 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-OGE Energy Corp Posts Qtrly EPS of $1.48

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-OGE Energy Corp Posts Qtrly EPS of $1.48
text:
Feb 22 (Reuters) - OGE Energy Corp:
* QTRLY EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.48 * OG&E IS PROJECTED TO EARN $1.43 TO $1.53 PER AVERAGE DILUTED SHARE‍​ IN 2018
* QTRLY OPERATING REVENUES $501.9 MILLION VERSUS $530.8‍​ MILLION
* OGE ENERGY CONSOLIDATED EARNINGS GUIDANCE FOR 2018 IS $1.90 TO $2.05 PER AVERAGE DILUTED SHARE
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $2.05 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* OGE ENERGY - 2017 CONSOLIDATED EARNINGS PER AVERAGE DILUTED SHARE INCLUDE $1.18 PER SHARE GAIN ON 2017 TAX REFORM AT UNREGULATED MIDSTREAM INVESTMENT‍​ Source text ( bit.ly/2GAQPQv ) Further company coverage: (Bengaluru Newsroom: +1 646 223 8780)
